definition: to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard

sentences.english: Today, on World Health Day, I wish you all good health.
sentences.chinese: 今天在世界卫生日，我祝愿你们大家身心健康。

sentences.english: So, once again, my best wishes to the College at the start of another academic year.
sentences.chinese: 因此，再一次在新学年向学院致以我最诚挚的祝愿。

sentences.english: More weeks of life-saving Church, I wish everyone good health.
sentences.chinese: 愈周救生堂，祝愿人人身体健康。

sentences.english: We sincerely hope that Thailand enjoys social harmony, economic development as well as prosperity and peace.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝愿泰国社会和谐，经济发展，国泰民安。

sentences.english: A holiday wish from your son Tom.
sentences.chinese: 寄上佳节的祝愿，你们的女子汤姆敬上。

sentences.english: I wish you all the best pictures you can get and a ton of happy customers.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝愿你们都有好前景，收获一大堆的快乐顾客。

sentences.english: Wish you lots of love, joy &happiness. happy christmas.
sentences.chinese: 祝愿你拥有更多的爱与幸福，圣诞节快乐。

sentences.english: I wish you all, wherever you may be, a very happy Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 不论你们现时身在何处，我都祝愿你们圣诞快乐。

sentences.english: eg: I sincerely wish this Business Summit a complete success.
sentences.chinese: 我衷心祝愿本届峰会取得圆满成功。
其次，我们需要“祝愿来年幸运”。

sentences.english: I see you are an ambitious young lady. I wish you can make GREater pro GREss in the future.
sentences.chinese: 看得出你很有雄心，祝愿你在将来取得更大的进步。

sentences.english: Wish you and your family a very happy new year.
sentences.chinese: 祝愿您及全家新年欢愉。

sentences.english: I wish Buddhaholy and the Tasmanian Buddhist community all the very best into the future.
sentences.chinese: 我祝愿佛圣及塔斯曼尼亚佛教团体在未来一切都很好。

sentences.english: A special wish for my friend . May the beauty of the season bring joy to your heart.
sentences.chinese: 衷心祝愿我的朋友，愿这良辰美景带给你内心的欢乐。

sentences.english: Please convey my best wishes to him.
sentences.chinese: 请向他转达我最好的祝愿。

sentences.english: The Master gave souvenirs to his disciples, hoping that this would bring them auspiciousness and good health.
sentences.chinese: 恩师为弟子们发送纪念品，祝愿六时吉祥，身心健康。

definition: to wish/to express good wishes/to pray/(old) wizard
to congratulate beforehand/to offer best wishes for
to have all one's wishes (idiom)/best wishes/all the best/may all your hopes be fulfilled
to have one's wishes come true/wish you the best!
to offer humbly (written at the end of letter from sb of lower status to higher status)/your humble servant
to congratulate respectfully/to wish good luck and success (esp. to a superior)/with best wishes (in writing)
to be successful in one's studies/academic success
Get well soon!/to recover health quickly
to have a pleasant journey/Bon voyage!
